website_summaries.verdict: This fancy dress can be enhanced with a few DIY tricks that can literally light up the dress' pretty details.
pros: Described as better looking in real life versus its picture
if not, on the smaller size
Adapts well to customized looks including battery operated lights that further illuminate the princess look and feel
cons: Several parts of the dress are stitched together, so if one part fails, the whole outfit may not work

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is just beautiful! Much better than I had hoped. Many layers to it. I needed it for a Disney Cruise. I added battery operated lights and it looks spectacular! I didn't use the butterflies. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful--money well spent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a 10 and she's 6--she's 99% for her height and maybe 90% for her weight. She has been longing to play dress up again, especially with a toddler sister just getting into it. This gown is simply lovely. The skirt is very full and more elegant than the little girl in the picture appears. The shimmer factor is high and it's very well made. I'm used to toddler costumes where they wear them once and they fall apart. This is on par, if not higher quality, than buying from The Disney Store.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepurpletoes

customer_reviews.title: I love this beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: I love this beautiful dress!! It was even more beautiful in person. The butterflies clip on. We actually just left them off. But they seem pretty easy to put on. Very beautiful dress!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penney
customer_reviews.text: Dress is a pretty as pictured! One of the favorite details of this dress is the velvety soft lining that keeps any scratchy material from irritating my little princess. I gave this dress to my 5 year old grand daughter for her birthday. She is average size and height and wears size 5 clothing. I ordered the size 5/6 and it fit perfectly. There is still a little room to grow in the bodice, and the skirt hangs about 2 - 3 inches from the floor. The top tulle layer of this dress is a bit longer than the inside layer and could be easily cut if needed for shorter children. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, beautiful and quality
customer_reviews.text: This dress is so soft which was unexpected for such a fluffy dress. It's sparkly with zero glitter (thank you!). The best part is the bodice of the dress is stretchy fabric which makes putting this one and removing so easy. It also allows for growth! We got this for my two year old for Halloween. She has worn at least three days a week since! It's getting a little tatered if you look closely, but man is it holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Heather Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 54" and 75 lbs and the 10/12 was perfect. The dress is a quarter inch from touching ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this princess dress for my 7 year daugher. The online pictures give it no justice. It is a stunning, flowing dress with VERY soft material. The sizing is generous and the material stretches. My daughter is 54" and 75 lbs and the 10/12 was perfect. The dress is a quarter inch from touching the floor; it's very long.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: This dress is amazing. My 6 (almost 7) year old cant get ...
customer_reviews.text: This dress is amazing. My 6 (almost 7) year old cant get enough of it! It fits her beautifully! My only complaint is that it arrived and smelled terrible. We hung it outside for 2 nights (first time right side out, second night inside out) and sprayed it with fabreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This dress is very pretty and well made. It fits exactly like it should IMO. Our daughter can wear anything from a size 5 to a size 6X depending on the brand, we ordered the 5/6 and it fit perfectly, she can probably wear it next year too! It was floor length without dragging the ground which is perfect! The butterflies are not attached but can be placed on the dress wherever you please with a safety pin that is already attached. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: B. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr old niece loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old niece who just LOVED it! She tried it on as soon as she unwrapped it and did not want to take it off. From an adult perspective, however, I find the dress okay, certainly not amazing or high quality. I think it looks better on the picture than in person. The pin-on butterflies could be nicer in my opinion and I told her parents to watch that the pins with which the butterflies attach to the dress are all closed properly so that she won’t get pricked. So overall 5 star rating from my niece and 3 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: segalski

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: If you're questioning about buying this dress, DO IT. I cannot rave enough about how beautiful this dress is, in person. I was initially a bit concerned about the sleeves because my daughter is VERY particular about "itchy" fabric but there were NO complaints from her. She wore this to Disney on Ice where there were tons of other kids in Disney dresses and she was stopped numerous times and complimented. The dress came with plastic butterflies to clip on, but we elected to leave them off and I think it made the dress look even better. I am seriously amazed at how beautiful this dress turned out. 10/10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Stembridge

customer_reviews.title: 6 year loves this dress!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy!! I bought several different princess dresses for my 6 year old for Christmas and this is her favorite. She changes into it almost daily so now that we’ve had it 6 months I am happy to report it has stood up to a lot of wear and tear! It’s better quality than I expected and it’s really easy for her to get on and off on her own. It just pulls right on and no buttons or zippers to worry about. She says it’s very comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: JessR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress but stinks bad
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful dress for my 7 yrs old princess. It was a beautiful fit. Only thing was it had extreme stink to the dress. I had to put the dress in the room no body goes for over a week . It was horrible but after a week it got better. Dress is preety but smell from dress was awful. I will give 4 stars .
customer_reviews.author: lovie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful than I thought it would be and great for the price. Very good quality. It's lined so you don't feel the tulle on the legs. It runs a little large and is long but so pretty. Nice sparkle that's in the fabric so there's nothing to shed. It came a bit crunched up so I hung it in the shower, sprayed the lining and tulle with a water bottle, and put it on no heat in the dryer. It came out nice and fluffy. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This skirt is very beautiful,my daughter likes it. But its quality is not good, There are lot of thread on the shoulder, After wearing it twice, the front ornaments are broken. My daughter like it, but I’m not satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful, colorful
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited when she opened her birthday gift to see this princess costume. She had to put it on immediately. It is a beautiful, colorful, well made dress up princess gown with darling little butterflies to attach anywhere on the dress with small safety pins. However, the butterflies are a little difficult to apply to the gown because the safety pins are very small, requiring some patience. Otherwise, this is a perfect gift for a young girl.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Great "Belle" Dress
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to be "Belle" from Beauty and the Beast and so we ordered this dress. It is perfect! It fits well and is very fancy. It is great as a costume or a fancy party dress. The butterflies that come with it are attached to safety pins and come in a separate package so you don't need to use them if you don't want to (we chose not to). I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Fagnant-macarthur

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality, and fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dress! Amazing quality! This is my second dress ordered from this website and I recommend this dress to any parent of a little princess. I wash on normal cycle in washing machine and hang dry. Soft and comfortable. Easy for my five year old to take off and put on by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this costume
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful. My daughter wanted to be Cinderella for Halloween. Found this one and loved it. Very pretty blue stood up to her running up and down the streets. Every house we went to she got complements on how beautiful she was. The butterflies are a perfect touch and gives the dress an extra something. Fit as expected did touch to the ground. Made my daughter’s face light up when she saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend's granddaughter to watch the royal wedding. She wore it all day and wanted to sleep in it. What she especially loved about this dress was that it came to her ankles, and she's fairly tall for a 4 yr old. The fit was perfect and she also had to pin the butterflies on her dress. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is absolutely beautiful. It’s very full and the details are nicely done. It does seem to run a bit small (which I read and ordered one size larger than I would for regular clothes). It fits my Granddaughter well, with a tiny bit of room to grow, and she looks like a Princess in it. I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bowman

customer_reviews.title: This is the dress to buy for your little want -to-be princess!
customer_reviews.text: This dress if very high quality, and we love it. My just turned 4 year old f, average size, fits perfectly in the size 4/5 , coming all the way to her feet, which she loves. The butterflies come separately in a little bag with safety pins on them to pin wherever you please, so don't throw them away with the box! Definitely high enough quality this can be worn to a very special occasion, even a wedding if she wants to be a princess in attendance!
customer_reviews.author: JMcMaken

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my best friends daughter who is princess obsessed. It fits her perfectly and the quality is better than we could have hoped for. Many times with these dress up clothes they fall apart sighing a week or so of her wearing them daily, but this one is already a month old and surviving the wash and the toddler wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: We love this dress!!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is soo pretty. My daughter feels like a true princess wearing it! It’s sturdy and comfortable. She didn’t need to wear anything underneath because the material is not scratchy. It’s well made - it even survived being tangled in a bike chain with no rips or marks!! We love this dress! I would definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong buying this dress...we bought this for our 4 year old daughter for Halloween. She got SO many compliments on it because the dress is just beautiful, it's very 'poofy', the material is awesome for the price. The butterflies are awesome and a wonderful added touch. Great buy, and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jlynne

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & very fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through two of these dresses. Not for lack of quality, but my daughter loves it and is hard on dress up cloths. It’s beautiful, stretchy, soft and very fluffy! It’s always disappointing when we order a princess dress thinking it will be full and puffy and when it arrives it’s cheep and flat. Not the case with this one!💗
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, bargain price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Only a tiny bit too large my daughter has had it for nearly a year and has used it over and over again. Easily machine washable. My ONE AND ONLY gripe is the safety pins that come with the butterflies are way too tiny it hurt our fingers trying to them
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The dress arrived today and I was worried it wouldn't have the butterflies after seeing some pics without the butterflies. They come detached in their own bag with gold safety pins. I freaking love this dress. I want an adult version. I wanna be a princess too now. So worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Downe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely snagable, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: We like this dress a lot, but the top layer material is like the most snagable material possible. Then you get these spiderweb-fine threads pulling out. But otherwise it’s a great fluffy princess dress that is modest for our little girl.
customer_reviews.author: angieGreenGood

customer_reviews.title: Buy this - not a box store dress
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy online but this turned out excellent. Better quality than anything I would have picked up at a box store. The skirt is full and the material is all soft - not scratchy. My daughter is four, but usually fits a youth xs/s or 5/6. I ordered the 5/6 and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress! Was going to purchase a Cinderella costume at Party City but the fabric is very itchy and irritating for my daughter. This dress had a very nice feel to it and my 2 year old did not complain of being itchy at all. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I purchased a 3T and fit the was great.
customer_reviews.author: AKGM

customer_reviews.title: Goof for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful dress! Our daughter ( 3 years) does not feel comfortable in it and says that the dress pricks , but it looks great on her! She could wear it about half an hour and then asked to take it off
customer_reviews.author: Genia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is by far worth the price! The quality exceeded my expectations. It is by far my granddaughter ‘s favorite and is worn several times per week. It washes nice on the gentle cycle and used just air dry in the dryer for a couple of minutes and just hung up to completely dry. I’m thinking about buying a larger one for her when she out grows this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Girls Princess Dress
customer_reviews.text: My girls wanted to dress like princesses for their 3rd birthday (10/1) and Halloween. These dresses delivered. The quality is great for active toddlers and they look amazing. They were so over the moon about the dresses, they didn't want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: QLP

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a princess
customer_reviews.text: The dress was adorable. Just as described. Well made, very full, fit my 4 year old granddaughter well, with a little room to grow. It's a darker pink than shown, more of a raspberry pink, but still quite pretty. The dress does have a chemical smell when first removed from package, but it went away. We are very pleased with this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R.

customer_reviews.title: This dress is beautiful and most importantly
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful and most importantly, soft! My daughter is almost 4 and she loves it. She prefers it to any costumes we buy in the park in Disney.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My daughter love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Princess dress for my daughter to play with... Made from great material! Easy to Dress-Up, My daughter love it, and wears it all day long... highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: reut

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter and I could not be more pleased with the quality. The dress fit her perfectly and she feels like a princess in it. She put it on the moment she opened it and has not taken it off since. She wants to wear it every where she goes. I would recommend this dress to anyone who has a child that likes to play dress up.
customer_reviews.author: RMoore

customer_reviews.title: my kid loves this
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this dress. The only thing I would change is the outer layer of lace. It's silver and very thin...we washed it on gentle and it got all wierd...but its still enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: jessika jimenez

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves it and My Son Almost Broke it
customer_reviews.text: The dress is beautiful and mostly well made. My 3 year old loved it as her Butterfly Princess Dress for her Butterfly Tea Party. It did not take my 2 year old son long to grab hold of the beaded snowflake and loosen it. Knowing I could repair it, I looked to see how it was sewn in and it's seriously a single piece of string loosely attaching the beads to the dress. It's an easy fix but they should have been attached better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Material was very nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Material was very nice and soft! I ordered a 2T for my 10 month old (20 lb) and it fits her perfectly except length (as to be expected)... They should've paidmore attention when making this though it isn't straight by any means...see in picture but im gonna roll it back for style and fold/pin the netting to give more fluff and shorter in the front... She's wearing this to my sister-in-law's wedding (renissance style)...
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I know the dress is very well made because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I know the dress is very well made because I had to hand wash it 5 times with different detergents to get the ‘fishy’ smell out of the dress. I decided it was the dye. When washing it did not fade or show color in the water at all. Only one bead fell off! I didn’t have time to return the dress as I needed it quickly for a birthday party. She loves it and wears it often.
customer_reviews.author: s. mauldin

customer_reviews.title: So so pretty
customer_reviews.text: This dress is absolutely gorgeous. My daughter loves it. It twirls, fits comfortably, is made with good quality material, does not look cheap in any way and it does not smell like so many reviewers said they had. I would have given it 5 stars if the butterflies were fabric instead of paper but no big deal ... I’ll bedazzle them Myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Tosado-Bernier

customer_reviews.title: She is very tall and slim and the 4/5 fits perfect. It is nicely made for the price and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a birthday gift for my 4 yr. old granddaughter. She is very tall and slim and the 4/5 fits perfect. It is nicely made for the price and she loves it. She brought it to my house and played in it most of the day, just needed my help to get it on & off. I also bought the gloves, necklace, tiara and shoes that light up to go with it. A big hit! Shoes are a little big for her size 10 feet, but it gives her growing room. Have not used the butterflies that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied Belle for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my 8 year old a 10/12 and it fits like a dream. She is tall for her age and wears 10/12 normally. She absolutely loves this dress. It is made very and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! She hardly ever wants to take it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my little cousin. She loved it! She hardly ever wants to take it off. It is comfortable and cute. It looks like I know what I'm getting her again for Christmas this year! She's growing so it's time for a new dress/color! It fit her perfectly as the size chart said it would.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Dress was really cute but my tiny 3 year old granddaughter (about 25 lbs) just fits in it. Her 3rd birthday was in July and I was hoping this would be big enough to wear for Halloween but sadly I don't think it will fit. I bought the 3T size so I would definitely recommend getting at least one size bigger just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NO glitter! Better quality than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Best part of all...there is NO glitter on this dress, but it is shimmering! The dress was a better quality than I expected. There is no odor like other reviews said...and I am very sensitive to smells. My granddaughter is a little short for a two year old, so it was a little big on her, but she can grow into it! She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Les42leco

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to lots of little kid abuse
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a good purchase. It has held up well despite lots of play and abuse. The butterflies can be put on or off as desired, those a little cheap but the rest of the dress is well made and soft. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LinVT

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and she was very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I caught this as a princess birthday dress for my little one. We took her to Medieval Times in Anaheim. And she holds the actual princess of place it was glorious.
customer_reviews.author: S Bear

customer_reviews.title: Dress not as described and pictured
customer_reviews.text: The dress I received was not the same dress as the photos. This dres has long velvet sleeves. Very disappointing as this was a birthday gift for my daughter- who doesn’t like long sleeves. I am returing it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dress
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. We decided not to bring it to Disney so when we went to have lunch with cindarella, we went to the shop next to the castle and bought a $60 cindarella dress that was half as good as this dress. This is an awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little princesses. Big sister really wanted them to match and I didn’t want to spend a fortune! Great dress, ours had a bit of an odor, but not bad and aired out quickly. Under fabric and tool was very soft!
customer_reviews.author: busymomma29

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dress
customer_reviews.text: Such perfect dress!!! Fits my daughter like a glove.Love the cotton inside liner, so much better on the skin than most dress up princess dresses!
customer_reviews.author: simona maria

customer_reviews.title: Little girl loves
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter’s baby sister she is 2 1/2. She loves her fancy Princess dress and wears it all the time I’m going to buy her another one for her birthday in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  ever heart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and well
customer_reviews.text: 8-10 is a perfect fit for my size 8 daughter! Still room to play and grow without being too large! Love how there are plenty of paper butterflies for many chances of play!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stoudt

customer_reviews.title: Great dress!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, great meteral not cheap feeling. My daughter will be able to wear this dress for Halloween and keep it for dress up for some time :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley weber

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL FOR YOUR QUEEN
customer_reviews.text: The color was on point, very well made however they fail to indicate that the butterflies have to be put on by yourself with pins. In any event, the price, quality of the dress made my daughters Queen birthday party a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very beautiful and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This dress is more beautiful in person and better than I expected. I bought the 6/8 and it fits my daughter who wears a 6 perfectly. She is thrilled and can’t wait to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: JeniH

customer_reviews.title: Birthday girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend's daughter for her birthday and she doesn't want to take it off. She spends as much time as possible wearing it. It fits her great and she seems comfortable. I love the long length. Great for dress up.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: It was cute, but does not go all the way to the floor. Luckily my little princess didn’t care, but I think it would be WAY cuter had it actually went all the way to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter received this dress for her birthday. If I could record her squeal when she opened it, that would be my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Gentosi

customer_reviews.title: The flowers come in a separate package and have to be pinned on
customer_reviews.text: Is very fluffy fabric is soft maybe a little too soft to pin the butterflies on I’m afraid it will rip I love the fact that the butterflies do not come attached my 3 year old usually wears a 4t and the dress fits perfect she loves it and didn’t want to take it off it’s a perfect addition to her dress collection for our many trips to Disney
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect and the dress is beautiful, but the ends started fraying after the first night of wear. It's a pretty dress overall though, and was very "Cinderella" like.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Princess Dress!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little dress is wonderful. My granddaughter has not stopped twirling since she got it. She even hugged it before she crawled into bed tonight!
customer_reviews.author: A Little ol' gal from "Jaw-Ja"

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, decent material, great price
customer_reviews.text: My tiny 4 year old wants to be Cinderella for Halloween. She’s 4 but in a 2T size for clothes, about 35” tall. This dress fits great with a little room to grow into, but not so much that it’s way too big to wear now. The material is nice and there’s no crazy glitter! Just a nice shimmery material!
customer_reviews.author: MGian

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dress! I bought it for a princess birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Shanda H. Lawing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made cute dress! I bought it for my daughter as a Halloween costume. She turned 5 in August, size 5-6 is perfect. I thought the length would be too long, because 5-6 is usually longer for her, but its right on her toes. Sizing up may be good if your kids like a little loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tadama

customer_reviews.title: Quality not so great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this dress for my little one but it didn’t survive one day at Disney land - quality not so great
customer_reviews.author: -K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful dress and my 3yo loves it. The butterfly pins looked super cheap and not at all like the dress in the movie so I just left them off. It doesn’t need them and cheapened the look of the dress.
customer_reviews.author: Kac

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is gorgeous and even more so in person than online! My daughter was thrilled with it and can’t wait to wear it on Halloween. While it seems to fit pretty true to size, it is a tad long. But overall, so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kamg

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this dress. As soon as I opened it up and actually was able to touch it, I could tell the quality. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: H.ris

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful and full than anything in stores!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is STUNNING. Just like the product photo. Did smell a tiny bit but a bit of Febreeze fixed that. Our little girl was absolutely floored when she got to wear this for Halloween (she wore it every day for 2 weeks leading up to the actual trick-or-treating...)
customer_reviews.author: njenks817

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress was perfect for the occasion and it fit perfectly. My granddaughter loves it and still wears it when she comes here
customer_reviews.author: SariMae

customer_reviews.title: Great for dress up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dress for the price. Overall it’s made well except for the jem flower on the front, the one jewel was practically off when it arrived. Not a big deal at all if you have a needle and thread though!
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: Made well and the fabric is nice not cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Beautiful dress for that special little girl. Could be a flower girl dress as well. My granddaughter will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: its a pretty dress but as soon as my daughter put it on the star on the front started to fall off. i sewed it back on the a couple days later another one fell off i decided to go ahead and redo all of them. the outside is messed like and gets stuck on everything.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this dress for my daughter loved so much and wore this to school program last week.
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cinderella Dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress is even more beautiful in person. I bought the dress as a Christmas present for my granddaughter. She is going to Disney and having breakfast with the Princesses. She will definitely be the prettiest princess there. Highly recommend this beautiful dress.
customer_reviews.author: DTab

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother buying
customer_reviews.text: Came broken and very scratchy. Poor materials and dont even bother safety pinning the cardboard butterflies on it. If my 3 year old daughter would let me return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Roll Tide

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DRESS
customer_reviews.text: My 7-yr old granddaughter absolutely loves this dress. It’s soft, well made and the size chart was spot on. Like a few others have noted, it has a fishy odor but airing outdoors took care of that problem.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: That it fit just right n the lining was not a problem at all just perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy 😃 with this princess dress 👗 that she wore at her school Halloween 👻 parade
customer_reviews.author: lesa constantine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a princess!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Absolutely gorgeous dress!! I was so skeptical about getting this.. I’m so glad i did! It’s puffy like a princess dress and glittery, just beautiful! Good material, comfortable. Definitely recommend! We didn’t use the butterflies the dress is just too beautiful to use them :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it and she been dress it up all day and everyday. SHE LOOKS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT! She’s very satisfied!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Alanis

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous dress
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old granddaughter loves this dress so much and that makes me love it, good quality, beautiful dress for play or even to wear to parties. glad i ordered 1 size up because it fits almost perfectly with a little room to grow, she usually wears a 2T but i ordered a 3T. would definetly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful in person, I looked for other dresses and decided on this one due to the look I wanted and other reviews. I am so glad I went with this dress! My daughter wears a 7/8 and I bought the 6x/8 size I do wish I would have went to the next size up but it wouldn't have arrived on time. This one does fit and is beautiful but she will out grow it fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and detail!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Excellent price. A little long for my daughter, but I hemmed the lining skirt and it's great. The butterflies are optional safety pins, so I didn't use them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Olweean

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't great
customer_reviews.text: This product was not the quality I was hoping for. But Granddaughter still likes it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't itch!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and doesn't itch...the length is just right. Nice durable fabric for costume!!
customer_reviews.author: Sasckia Lyons

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress is so very pretty. It exceeded our expectations. It pulls on & has a nice soft lining so nothing is scratching. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MaraM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter liked it of course but I believe it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: too expensive, a filmsy all nylon princess dress for an expensive price. My daughter liked it of course but I believe it is not worth it. does look cheaply made as well.
customer_reviews.author: superman77

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for character day at my daughter school. She’s satisfied with it and so am I. She didn’t want to put the paper butterflies on it but it’s still pretty good without it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanasha

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one size up!
customer_reviews.text: This dress I absolutely the cutest! 4 stars because there were a lot threads coming out by the shoulder. Hoping that it doesn't fall apart. I ordered up one size and fits perfectly. She is a size 3, the dress is a size 4. Bottom of the dress hits the floor but doesn't drag and has lots of volume!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hall

customer_reviews.title: I basted a hem on it as it was a bit long but otherwise it was loved.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Halloween costume, it was a big hit and fit well. I basted a hem on it as it was a bit long but otherwise it was loved.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dress! However... the smell...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her dress! I sowed on some lights and it is a complete show stopper! I gave it 4 stars only bc when I took it out the packaging it smelled like rotten fish. Had to hand wash it twice and let it air dry. Other than that this is a great dress for any princess. The fabric on the torso is stretchy and not tight or restricting.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Defects
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with odd small holes and other small manufacturing defects.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KPJ

customer_reviews.title: A little short but workable
customer_reviews.text: Cute dress, a little.shorter than expected, but in range to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: P Yard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gown for a princess. Granddaughter loved it. And so did everyone who saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Has a smell
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty dress and fit great but taking it out the box it had a smell and it did not go away after washing it! Took a few washes to get the smell out. It was a fishy plastic kind of smell!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: She looked Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We got so many compliments on this dress. Everyone wanted to know where we got the dress. We pointed them in the right direction. Thanks for a fine product
customer_reviews.author: Deebee2

customer_reviews.title: The gown fit her beautifully and came as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my youngest daughter in time for Halloween. It was a little long for her but she just picked up the skirts and kept on walking. The gown fit her beautifully and came as pictured. I couldn't have asked for better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dressy Daisy Girls Princess Dress Costume Christmas Halloween Fancy Dresses Up Butterfly Size 24M-12
product_meta.description:
Perfect Princess style costume for your little princess. She will look like and feel like a real princess in this dress. This dress is truly stunning with its sparkling diamante and shimmery spider web. Appropriate for meeting princesses a fancy, birthday party, Halloween, princess phototshoot, and dress up etc. It makes any girl feel magical!
You and your baby are going to love this costume!

For the shipments fulfilled by seller, it takes 8-12 working days to deliver. For those buyers who are outside USA, it may takes a little longer time. We offer expedited delivery service as well. For details, please refer to our shipping information. If you have any question, please feel free to contact us.
feature_bullets: Stunning princess style costume. Style A: off shoulder with removable butterflies decoration. Style B: A pair of long puff sleeve. Made of comfortable material. No itchy! And hand washable!
Velvet bodice has beautiful lace at centre embellished. Eye catching decoration at centre neckline.
Layers of ruffled tulle or organza at the waistline gives this style lots of fullness.
The shell is comprised of multi layers of tulle and cotton lining attached crinoline netting for additional fullness.
Elastic waist and neckline for easy dressing. Pullover style. No zipper or clasp.
